title: Strengthening Organizational Learning Capabilities via Collaborative Culture: Math Problem-Solving Projects

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: A collaborative problem-solving course where administrators resolve real-world mathematical challenges through knowledge sharing

learning_goals: Learners can design and implement knowledge-sharing systems with peers using collaboration tools.
Learners can successfully perform a team-based decision-making process in mathematical problem-solving with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can propose at least three improvement strategies for organizational learning culture through project deliverables.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
